response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to me, but I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Given its significance and rarity, I am offering it to you for $1,400,000. I believe this price reflects the true worth of the product while providing you with a significant advantage over potential competitors in the market. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 1400000}
